channel.title: Serielizados on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Serielizados on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sally Wainwright, Ólafur Darri Ólafsson, Trine Dyrholm to Attend Barcelona Serielizados Festival Which Reveals Its International Series Competition (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Serielizados, the fast-expanding series festival due to unfold in Barcelona over Nov. 3-12 and on the streaming platform Filmin Nov. 10-23, has upped its international stakes for its 12th edition
